name: The Room Between Doors
description:
Try your best to escape this surreal Hotel Room, but remember things may not be how they seem!

Controls:

E - Interact with objects

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look

Spacebar - Jump

We Recommend Playing In Full Screen Mode

Alt +F4 to exit the Downloaded version of the game.

Sound Credits:

Music By: szegvari (May 4th, 2021)

Mouseclick by: diako93 (March 1st, 2022)

Door Unlock by: angelkunev (May 21st, 2020)
